text: Gallitzin may be: ==People== * Demetrius Augustine Gallitzin (1770–1840), an American Roman Catholic priest ==Places== * Gallitzin, Pennsylvania, US * Gallitzin Township, Pennsylvania, US * Gallitzin State Forest, Pennsylvania, US ==See also== * House of Golitsyn, sometimes transliterated Galitsin or Galitzine
title: Gallitzin
